CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Access_Type__c, "Periodic"), ( UnitPrice * Quantity * Period_In_Months__c ) - ((UnitPrice * Quantity * Period_In_Months__c ) * (-Calculated_Price_Adjustment__c)),
IF( ISPICKVAL(Access_Type__c, "Monthly"), (UnitPrice * Quantity * 24) - ((UnitPrice * Quantity * 24 ) * (-Calculated_Price_Adjustment__c)),
(UnitPrice * Quantity) - (UnitPrice * Quantity * (-Calculated_Price_Adjustment__c)) ) )
CustomField.label: Total Calculated Price
